sentence: Last  month,  Israel  presented  the  agency  with  evidence  that  12  people  who  worked  for  the  organization  took  part  in  the  Oct.  7  Hamas  attacks  in  Israel  that  killed  some  1,200  people.
UNRWA  said  of  the  12  people  implicated,  nine  were  fired,  one  was  confirmed  dead,  and  it  was  looking  into  the  identity  of  two  others.
